articles.title: New imaging technology less accurate than MRI at detecting prostate cancer, trial shows - EurekAlert
articles.description: A team of researchers in Australia and New Zealand has found that MRI scans can detect prostate cancer more accurately than the newer, prostate-specific -PSMA PET/CT scanning technique. The findings are being presented today at the European Association of Uro…
